comments:
Details:
Add a nonexistent library to nonexistent folder

Step:
1.Open Library explorer
2.Right click and select Add library.
3.Insert abc.rptlibrary that is nonexistent in source file.
4.Insert abc.rptlibrary in file name.
5.Click Finish and it pop up the dialog said that the library is nonexistent.
6.Refresh and Deploy the library.

Actual result:
Pop up an NullpointerException

try the latest build.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 146993 ***

I try the lastest builder, bug #146993 is fixed, but this bug is also exist. Please have a check. And I think it is not a duplicate bug. 

Reopen this bug!

The NPE thrown out is because of the library file is blank.

Check the resource folder for library after the step 5. UI create a blank library with 0 byte. Model parser parse the blank file will throw out this exception. 

When the operation finish by step 4, UI pop an erorr message to tell user the file does not existed, which is correct. But after the error message, UI should not create a blank library file.
